title: A discription of Nortons falcehod of Yorke shyre, and of his fatall farewel The fatal fine of traitours loe: by iustice due, deseruyng soe.
author: Gibson, William, ballad writer.
publisher: By Alexander Lacie, for Henrie Kyrkeham, dwellyng at the signe of the blacke Boye, at the middle north dore of Paules church,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
